$Slippi Recording [Fizzi, Achilles]
*Used in conjunction with Slippi plugged into PortB to extract game data

$Slippi Playback [Fizzi, UnclePunch, Achilles]
*Used to play back a .slp file
*Will always play 'CurrentGame.slp' in the Slippi folder
041A45C0 3860000E #Boot into game [UnclePunch]
C206B0DC 00000031 #ReceiveGameFrame [Fizzi]
